content.html: Seeing people post such nasty and attacking things towards someone like @MartinSLewis who’s done more to educate the public on the energy crisis than the government has is sad. I guess with the Govt hiding behind policy the public want someone to direct their anger towards.
content.value:
Seeing people post such nasty and attacking things towards someone like @MartinSLewis who’s done more to educate the public on the energy crisis than the government has is sad.

I guess with the Govt hiding behind policy the public want someone to direct their anger towards.
